comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

I'm sorry for reporting this "bug", but E-bay made to do it.
E-bay pages (I use co.uk domain) do have WATCH LIST section. I don't know anythning about code used by Ebay to display it, but it might be a DIV & CSS. In this section, ENDED link is not shown anymore.
I've checked it on older Firefox (3.6.x), Opera 11 and MSIE (7/8/9) and this bug is NOT present there, so it doesn't look like bug in Ebay developer's code - which might lead to some bug in parser.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Firefox 4, Windows 7x64 version
2. Create an account on Ebay.co.uk
3. Add some items to your WATCH LIST
4. Look at WATCH LIST when auction ends - there's ALL and ACTIVE link under WATCH LIST title bar, but ENDED link is missing.
5. Open Opera, MSIE, or old Firefox 3 and reproduce steps 1-4 to see that ENDED link exists.
Actual Results:  
ENDED link under WATCH LIST title bar is missing (hidded under other DIV ?)

Expected Results:  
ENDED link under WATCH LIST title bar should have been shown.

Defaqult settings, Windows 7 x64, 4 GB RAM.

comments.raw_text: This sounds similar to bug 643456, which was resolved WFM.... I wonder if there is an underlying problem that isn't really fixed, but only shows up under specific conditions.
